resources.string: FRIED EGGS IN A FRYING PAN
CROUTONS FROM A LOAF WITH AN EGG
Milk-300 ml Semolina-3 tables.l. Sugar-1 tablespoon. Salt-to taste Butter-40g
White bread-300g Eggs-1 pc. Milk-50ml Butter-40g Salt-to taste
Eggs-1 pc. Butter-10g Salt-to taste Ground hot pepper-to taste

1. Prepare the necessary ingredients. Wash the egg with soap under a stream of warm water. This is necessary to ensure safety and protection from possible salmonella infection.

 2. Heat a frying pan with low sides over high heat. Add a piece of butter and melt it to a liquid state. Reduce the heat to medium.

 3. Beat the egg into a frying pan with hot oil. Try not to damage the integrity of the yolk. Distribute the protein in a circular motion so that it spreads evenly over the pan.

 4. Fry the scrambled eggs until the protein is completely set, and the yolk is still bright yellow and liquid.

 5. After the scrambled eggs have reached the required degree of readiness, you can lightly add salt and pepper to taste.

1. Prepare the products according to the list. Prepare a deep wide bowl and a frying pan. 2. In a deep bowl, beat the egg lightly, add salt or sugar if you are making sweet croutons. Pour in the milk and mix everything together.3 . Dip each slice of bread into the mixture so that it is well soaked. 4. Put the pan on medium heat, put the butter on it and wait until it melts completely.\\n 5. Place slices of bread in the egg mixture on a frying pan heated with oil and fry until a yellow-golden crust forms, first on one side, then, carefully turning over, on the other side. 6. Serve ready-made croutons from a loaf with egg and milk immediately. This is an independent dish.

1. To prepare semolina porridge, prepare all the ingredients. Milk for porridge can be used of any fat content. 2. It is convenient to use aluminum dishes or a saucepan with a thick bottom for cooking porridge. Pour the required amount of milk into the ladle. 3. Add a spoonful of sugar and a pinch of salt to the milk. 4. Then add semolina to the cold milk. Stir and put the ladle on the fire. If you like porridge more liquid, then only 2 tablespoons of cereals will be enough. 5. With constant stirring, bring everything to a boil. When boiling, the porridge will gradually become thick. Boil it, literally, for 20-30 seconds and remove from heat. Just do not stop stirring the porridge, otherwise you will get one big lump. It is not difficult to stand and wait for 1-2 minutes to boil. 6. Pour the finished porridge into a prepared plate, add a small amount of butter or fresh berries.

1. Prepare the products. You will need water in a ratio of 1:3 - three parts of water per one part of peas.

 2. First of all, rinse the peas well under running cool water. Change the water several times so that all dirt and dust are well washed. Pour all the water into the peas and send them to the stove.

 3. Make medium heat and bring the peas to a boil. Do not leave the stove at this time, high foam will rise, which can escape and stain the stove. Turn down the heat and remove the foam with a spoon. Add salt.

 4. Leave the peas to cook on the lowest heat. Stir it occasionally, checking the water level. Gradually, the peas will begin to soften, and the porridge will thicken.

 5. From now on, keep an eye on her more closely. Peas tend to burn if left without enough liquid. Try the porridge, if the grains are still hard, and the water has all boiled off, then add a little more.

 6. Remove the pan with the peas from the heat. Serve the peas immediately on the table. When cooled down, it becomes very thick.
SALAD WITH SMOKED BREAST AND KOREAN CARROTS

Smoked chicken-200g
Canned corn-200 g
Eggs-3 pcs.
Korean carrots-150g
Hard cheese-50g
Mayonnaise-70g

1. Prepare the ingredients. Boil the eggs in boiling water in advance for 7-9 minutes. Then drain the hot water from them and cool the eggs in cold water. Open the jar of corn and drain the liquid from it.

 2. Cut the smoked chicken breast into small cubes.

 3. Let's put the salad in layers in a ring. Put the chopped smoked chicken in the first layer and press down a little so that the layer is more dense. Brush the chicken with a small amount of mayonnaise.

 4. Cut the Korean carrots a little smaller than they are. In small pieces, it will look more harmonious in a salad.

 5. Put the chopped carrots in the next layer of lettuce and brush with mayonnaise.

 6. Put the third layer of cheese, grated on a medium or fine grater. Brush it with mayonnaise as well.

 7. Peel the boiled eggs from the shell, grate them and put them in a ring on top of the cheese layer. And some more mayonnaise.

 8. Put the canned corn in the top layer. Press down all the layers a little so that the salad is more dense and does not fall apart. Remove the ring from the salad. A delicious salad with smoked chicken and Korean carrots is ready! Cool it a little before serving!
